Name: The Firestarter
Description:
This enemy has X health, where X is three times the number of fire icons on the field.
This minion's health is equal to the number of fire icons on the board multiplied by 3.

Name: Fuel for the Fire
Description: Counters can't be removed from other durations (including when time passes).

Name: Smoke Inhalation
Description: The first action you play each turn costs an additional resource of any type.

Name: Flaming Canopy
Description: Whenever you would gain vitality, you may remove that many counters from this duration instead.

Name: Burning Trees
Description: When time passes, this deals 1 damage.

Name: Encroaching Flames
Description:
You may deal damage to this duration as if it were an enemy. If you do, remove time counters from it equal to the damage dealt.
Before time passes, if there is exactly one time counter on this duration, it deals 6 damage.

Name: Heat Wave
Description:
This deals X damage, where X is twice the number of fire icons in play. 
If there are one or fewer fire symbols in play, Surge.

Name: Emberling
Description:
This enemy gets +2 strength if there are 5 or more fire icons on the field.
Surge
